column2: Request the permanent installation of Cybernetics from the Celestial Empire.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous cybernetic has been installed in you by a [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] wizard.
This magnificant cybernetic will bring you superhuman abilities!
